list_definition.definition: a type of flat container with a handle, used for holding dust swept from the floor

list_ex_of_english: Handheld dustpans may be used with either a full-size broom or with a smaller whisk broom or brush sometimes called a duster.
They must get their little dustpans and brushes out and clean up their own mess.
We are indeed a gilded dustpan and brush.
A variant on the dustpan is the silent butler, a handheld, lidded dustpan.
Spike appears and collects the dust using a dustpan and brush, and empties it into the bin.
On the first stair, a dustpan and brush quarrel with each other.
Streets were reportedly clean by 10 am, with volunteers having shown up with brooms and dustpans to clean the city.
She has to come here with a giant dustpan and brush.
